name: FairValue Corporate & Public Affairs
membership:
Association Française des Conseils en Lobbying (AFCL)
Cercle des délégués Permanents Français (CDPF)
goal:
A consulting firm in corporate communication and public affairs

FairValue Corporate & Public Affairs was created by Anne Mazoyer.
Its consultants design strategies which develop and strengthen the capital image and lobbying strategies of companies, institutions and their leaders in France and abroad. Moreover, we counsel our clients in their approach to local, national or EU institutions and in the management of their legislative risks.

FairValue Corporate & Public Affairs is an independent consultancy with offices in Paris, Brussels and Milan. It represents its clients before national and EU institutions and media. The firm has 9 consultants who counsel and assist their clients and refer to external experts for specific cases.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade
